HeroSection.title: Hi, I'm Monami!
HeroSection.introPrefix: I'm a junior software developer specializing in mobile development,
HeroSection.introSuffix: and working toward a career in innovative and forward-thinking industries.

AboutSection.title: About Me
AboutSection.subtitle: Get to know me!
AboutSection.introLine1: Hi, my name is Monami and I am a
AboutSection.introLine1Suffix: junior developer specializing in mobile development and software engineering.
AboutSection.education: I am currently studying ICT with a focus on mobile development, continuously building my skills through hands-on projects and real-world problem solving.
AboutSection.learningMindset: I enjoy exploring new technologies, learning continuously, and finding ways to improve my development workflow. Staying curious and engaged helps me grow both personally and professionally.
AboutSection.growthMindsetSuffix: and I approach every project with curiosity and a desire to improve. I’m passionate about technology and excited to build a career in innovative and forward-thinking industries.

libraryHub.name: Library Hub
libraryHub.description: Library Hub is an accessible and efficient digital library catalogue system that streamlines searching, borrowing, and returning books. It automates routine operations, provides real-time updates on book availability, and supports user engagement through multilingual content, role-based authentication, and reservation management features.

airportSimulator.name: Airport Simulator
airportSimulator.description: This project simulates the process of passengers moving through an airport using a queueing model. Passengers go through service points such as check-in, security, passport control, and boarding. Users can configure parameters such as arrival intervals, number of non-EU passengers, simulation time, and delay, while the interface visualizes queues and displays simulation results.

dailyBalance.name: Daily Balance
dailyBalance.description: Daily Balance is a web application designed to help users track and improve their well-being. It combines journaling, AI-powered analysis, and social features to provide insights into daily activities and their impact on overall health.

heartRate.name: Heart Rate Monitoring Device
heartRate.description: A Raspberry Pi Pico–based HR monitoring device with live PPG signals, HRV analysis, Kubios cloud integration via MQTT, and history tracking.

flightGame.name: Flight Game Project
flightGame.description: A collaborative flight simulation game using real-world airport data, Leaflet maps, and real-time weather from OpenWeatherMap.
